pageContext.title: Ultrabomb
pageContext.content: Ultrabomb consists of a group of heavy music industry hitters that include Greg Norton (Husker Du), Finny McConnell (The Mahones), & Jamie Oliver (UK Subs). Their new album ‘Time to Burn’ will be drops in early 2023 on red and black vinyl, CD, & on all digital platforms. A major U.S. and European tour to follow!
